title: Matrix Sum

explanation.approach: Loop through all elements and sum.
explanation.analogy: Count all cells in a grid.

title: Matrix Transpose
Diagonal Sum
Row Sum

explanation.analogy: Total for each row of spreadsheet.
steps: For each row, sum its columns

title: Column Sum

explanation.analogy: Total for each column of spreadsheet.
steps: For each column, sum its rows

title: Second Largest

steps: Track second if smaller than first

title: Remove Duplicates
Move Zeros to End

explanation.approach: Copy non-zeros, fill rest with zeros.
explanation.analogy: Slide non-zeros left, zeros fall to end.

title: Rotate Array Left

explanation.approach: Reverse first k, reverse rest, reverse all.

title: Rotate Array Right

explanation.approach: Reverse all, reverse first k, reverse rest.
